title: Introducing: Liv Dawson
content:
This debut from seventeen year old Liv Dawson is special.

Tapestry is immaculately produced, allowing her exquisite vocals to take centre stage, managing to come across as simultaneously touchingly delicate and alluringly powerful. This is undoubtedly one of the debut tracks of the year. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
